00046 namespace ebl {
00047 
00050   extern ebl::RenderThread gui;
00051 
00055   class GuiThread : public QWidget { 
00056     Q_OBJECT
00057   private:
00058     int                          wcur;
00059     unsigned int                 nwindows;
00060     std::vector<Window*>         windows;
00061     bool                         silent;
00062     std::string                  savefname;
00063   public:
00064     RenderThread                &thread;
00065 
00066   public:
00067     GuiThread(int argc, char **argv);
00068     virtual ~GuiThread();
00069 
00070   private slots:
00071     void window_destroyed(QObject *obj);
00072     void add_text(const std::string *s);
00073     void set_text_origin(unsigned int h0, unsigned int w0);
00074     void updatePixmap(Idx<ubyte> *img, unsigned int h0, unsigned int w0);
00075     void appquit();
00076     void clear();
00077     void new_window(const char *wname = NULL, unsigned int h = 0, 
00078                     unsigned int w = 0);
00079     void select_window(unsigned int wid);
00080     void set_silent(const std::string *filename = NULL);
00081   };
00082 
00087 #define MAIN_QTHREAD()                          \
00088   using namespace ebl;                          \
00089   int main(int argc, char **argv) {             \
00090     QApplication a(argc, argv);                 \
00091     a.setQuitOnLastWindowClosed(false);         \
00092     ebl::GuiThread gt(argc, argv);              \
00093     gt.thread.start();                          \
00094     a.exec();                                   \
00095     return 0;                                   \
00096   }                                             \
00097   void RenderThread::run()
00098   
00099 } // namespace ebl {
